short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Formats your SQL for easier reading, code review, and debugging.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Formats your SQL for easier reading, code review, and debugging. To use it, highlight a block of SQL on a webpage (such as inside a text field). Then click on the Chrome Extension icon in the URL bar (make sure it's pinned). For most websites, the newly formatted SQL will be written to your clipboard, and you can paste it from there! For websites that use the CodeMirror front-end text editor (Snowflake, Sisense for Cloud, and others), the SQL will be auto-pasted in the text-editor without requiring you to paste it.
